original_text: When they knew how much money was there, they gave it to the men who had authority over the work. Then those men paid the carpenters and the builders who were working on the Lord's temple.
korean_text: 그 달아본 은을 일하는 자 곧 여호와의 성전을 맡은 자의 손에 넘기면 그들은 또 여호와의 성전을 수리하는 목수와 건축하는 자들에게 주고

sentences.original_text: When they knew how much money was there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 얼마의 돈이 있는지 알았을 때

sentences.original_text: they gave it to the men
who had authority over the work
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 일에 대한 권한을 가졌습니다

sentences.original_text: Then those men paid the carpenters
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후 그 남자들은 목수들에게 돈을 지불했습니다

sentences.original_text: who were working on the Lord's temple
